newsitem.title: USA: Hilton CEO comfortable with 1997 estimates.
newsitem.headline: Hilton CEO comfortable with 1997 estimates.

text.p: Hilton Hotels Corp Chief Executive Stephen Bollenbach on Thursday said he was comfortable with analysts' earnings estimates for the second quarter and full year 1997.
Analysts expect Hilton to earn $0.34 a share in the second quarter, ending June 30, and $1.36 per share for the full year 1997, according to investment research firm First Call.
Speaking to reporters following Hilton's annual shareholder meeting here Bollenbach said "we are comfortable with them," after being asked about estimates.
